title: Electric field direction of hollow aluminum sphere

content.description: An isolated, hollow aluminum sphere is positively charged. A cross section through the center of the sphere is shown above.
content.question:
The direction of the electric field is correctly indicated in which of the following?
I. To the left at point A
II. To the right at point D
III. To the right at point E

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
